author: Simon Difford
description: The liqueur smooths and wonderfully combines with Scotch whisky. The proportions of Scotch to Drambuie vary wildly and are a matter of taste. However, somewhere around 3:1 appears to be preferred by most.
name: Rusty Nail cocktail

recipeInstructions.text: STIR ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass

video.name: HOWTO make Rusty Nail cocktail
